alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Meriwether; Pike; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:53PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Meriwether, Pike, northwestern Upson and southwestern Lamar Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 353 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Imlac, or 9 miles east of Greenville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Barnesville, Zebulon, Woodbury, Molena, Meansville, Aldora, Gay, The Rock, Concord, Atwater, Hilltop, Lifsey Springs, Hannahs Mill, Piedmont, and Imlac. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
